title: Rulemaking powers
context: §386-72 Rulemaking powers. In conformity with and subject to chapter 91, the director of labor and industrial relations shall make rules, not inconsistent with this chapter, which the director deems necessary for or conducive to its proper application and enforcement. [L 1963, c 116, pt of §1; Supp, §97-71; HRS §386-72; gen ch 1985; am L Sp 2005, c 11, §§7, 14]
